titleStmt.title: Isaacks pilgrimage A briefe and short treatise, of the strife that Isaack has with his heard-men, living in the land of the Philistines, with Abimeleck and his heard-men, shadowing out the strife which Christ our Lord had with his hearders, and with the Romayne philistims, which hath continued unto this day through now in a deepe consumption. Also a testimony from the prophets, Christ and his Apostles, of the abolishment of Antichrist, the man of sinne ... By Thomas Odell Englishman.
titleStmt.author: Odell, Thomas, Englishman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Fredericksz Stam, dwelling by the South-Church at the signe of the Hope,

notesStmt.note: the Roman numeral imprint date is made with turned C's.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
